title: Hallie Jackson | Trump Freaks Out After Democrats Win House: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump freaking out about Democrats winning back the House and his moves to hamstring the Russia investigation.

Then, Hallie Jackson talks about Jeff Sessions' forced resignation, what's stressing Donald Trump and the mayhem of the president's post-midterm press conference. She also takes a few more questions backstage.
